info.title: Project Management System API
info.description: A Laravel-based REST API for managing projects, tasks, comments, books, and products.

post.description: Creates a new category with name, price, and optional description. All fields are validated before creation.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific category by ID

message.example: The price must be a number.

price: The price must be a number.

message.example: The price must be a number.

price: The price must be a number.

post.description: Creates a new product with name, price, quantity, and optional description. All fields are validated before creation.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific product by ID

message.example: The price must be a number.

price: The price must be a number.

message.example: The price must be a number.

example.title: Implement User Authentication
